DataSource.Query: SELECT purchase.orders.order_id, account.users.name AS entered_by, purchase.orders.value_date, purchase.orders.expected_delivery_date, core.offices.office_name, purchase.orders.terms, purchase.orders.internal_memo, inventory.suppliers.supplier_name, purchase.orders.taxable_total, purchase.orders.discount, purchase.orders.tax_rate, purchase.orders.tax, COALESCE(purchase.orders.taxable_total, 0) + COALESCE(purchase.orders.tax, 0) - COALESCE(purchase.orders.discount, 0) AS sub_total, purchase.orders.nontaxable_total, COALESCE(purchase.orders.taxable_total, 0) + COALESCE(purchase.orders.tax, 0) + COALESCE(purchase.orders.nontaxable_total, 0) - COALESCE(purchase.orders.discount, 0) AS total FROM purchase.orders INNER JOIN core.offices ON purchase.orders.office_id = core.offices.office_id INNER JOIN account.users ON purchase.orders.user_id = account.users.user_id LEFT JOIN inventory.suppliers ON purchase.orders.supplier_id = inventory.suppliers.supplier_id WHERE purchase.orders.order_id=@order_id;

SELECT inventory.items.item_code, inventory.items.item_name, purchase.order_details.price, purchase.order_details.quantity, inventory.units.unit_name, ROUND(purchase.order_details.price * purchase.order_details.quantity, 4) AS amount, purchase.order_details.discount, ROUND((purchase.order_details.price * purchase.order_details.quantity) - purchase.order_details.discount, 4) AS sub_total, ROUND((purchase.order_details.price * purchase.order_details.quantity) - purchase.order_details.discount, 4) AS total FROM purchase.order_details INNER JOIN inventory.items ON purchase.order_details.item_id = inventory.items.item_id INNER JOIN inventory.units ON purchase.order_details.unit_id = inventory.units.unit_id WHERE purchase.order_details.order_id = @order_id ORDER BY purchase.order_details.order_detail_id;
